info.title: PrepInsta  NodeJs Backend
info.description: API's are Written in NodeJS,API's listed in this document are only specific to this  Backend, all API's have authorization for accessing them.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: provide value if you're disassociating admin then admin else branch or plan

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: provide  mongodb Id of above value

get.summary: Get college student course progress report
get.description: Returns paginated student statistics (started/completed courses, completion %) for a specific college.

200.description: Successful response with total students and their course statistics

get.summary: Get college student course progress report
get.description: Returns paginated student statistics (started/completed courses, completion %) for a specific college.

200.description: Successful response with download link and file name of the student report

get.description: This endpoint retrieves the total counts of admins, sub-admins, and teams.

parameters.name: planType
parameters.description: search by Type of the plan (1: B2B, 2: B2C)

parameters.name: discountType
parameters.description: search by Type of discount (1: Percentage, 2: Number Discount)

get.description: This endpoint retrieves the total counts of CollegeAdmin, sub-admins, and teams.
This endpoint retrieves the total counts of Quiz.

parameters.name: ClonedIn
parameters.description: Courses id those using this quiz

get.description: This endpoint retrieves the total counts of Question.

get.summary: Get a User Quiz Question by ID

put.summary: Update a User Quiz Question by ID

parameters.name: userQuizQuestionId
parameters.description: ID of the UserQuizQuestion to update

delete.summary: Delete a User Quiz Question by ID

parameters.name: userQuizQuestionId
parameters.description: ID of the UserQuizQuestion to delete

post.summary: Create user coding answer mapping or run test case

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: If emails array has more than 10 users then provide true

parameters.name: emails
parameters.description: List of email addresses. Can be provided as comma-separated string or array of emails

file.description: The CSV file to upload. The file should contain users information like email, passing_year etc.

CourseAbout.example: Prevents errors from accessing undefined or null values.  Deletes Projects, Tools, or CourseScreenshots only if they are completely empty.  Handles edge cases (like if ProjectImages exists but is an empty array).  Doesn't delete _id if other valid properties exist in the object.

CouponCode.description: The unique coupon code for applying the discount.

value.description: The value of the discount. If type is percentage, it's a percentage; if amount, it's a monetary value.

ProductIds.description: Array of ProductId on which the coupon is applicable to.

ProductNames.description: Array of product names the coupon is applicable to.

UsageLimit.description: The usage limit for the coupon, applicable if UsageType is 'limited'.

CouponValidFrom.description: This is required if UsageType is unlimited else

CouponValidTill.description: This is required if UsageType is unlimited

ProductIds.description: Array of product ObjectIds the coupon is applicable to.

CouponUsedCount.description: The number of times the coupon has been used.

status.description: Indicates whether the coupon is active.

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether the coupon is deleted.

_id.description: The unique identifier of the coupon.

CouponCode.description: The unique code for applying the coupon.

CouponValidFrom.description: The start date of the coupon's validity.

CouponValidTill.description: The expiration date of the coupon.

CreatedBy.description: The ID of the user who created the coupon.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the coupon was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the coupon was last updated.

__v.description: The version key used by MongoDB.
